summary: This is an email exchange from March 20, 2019, where an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York requests a copy of the search warrant affidavit and order for Jeffrey Epstein's residence from an unidentified recipient. The recipient agrees to email it the following morning.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: Requests a copy of the search warrant affidavit and order for Epstein's residence in connection with the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Email request for Epstein search warrant
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney emails an unidentified party requesting the search warrant affidavit and order for Jeffrey Epstein's residence, noting it was executed by local authorities before the FBI became involved.
personsInvolved: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York

keyFacts: A search warrant was executed at Jeffrey Epstein's residence by local authorities before the case was brought to the FBI.
The Assistant U.S. Attorney from the Southern District of New York was seeking the search warrant affidavit and order in March 2019 as part of the Epstein investigation.
The document indicates that the search warrant materials were not readily located in the materials reviewed by the requesting party.
